import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
dataset=pd.read_csv('../input/selfie-injury/Selfie_Related_Injuries.csv')
dataset.head()
source.0fa918b1:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
plt.figure(figsize=(6,2))
sns.countplot(dataset['Type'])
source.1696f5e1:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,8))
plt.xlabel('Country')
plt.ylabel('Injuries')
sns.scatterplot(x='Country',y='Injuries/Casualties',hue='Type',data=dataset)
#scatterplot based on country and total injuries on the type of injuries
source.3538e1ef:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,8))
plt.xlabel('Type')
plt.ylabel('Injuries')
sns.scatterplot(x='Type',y='Injuries/Casualties',hue='Country',data=dataset)
plt.show()

source.c43c9ce4:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,8))
plt.xlabel('Type')
plt.ylabel('Country')
sns.scatterplot(x='Type',y='Country',hue='Date',data=dataset)

source.951cf62f:
pivot1=\
dataset.pivot_table(index='Type', values='Injuries/Casualties',aggfunc=np.mean)
plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
pivot1.plot(kind='bar',color='purple')
plt.xlabel('Type')
plt.ylabel('Injuries')
plt.show()
source.bd260a3c:
pivot2=\
dataset.pivot_table(index='Country', values='Injuries/Casualties',aggfunc=np.mean)
plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
pivot2.plot(kind='bar',color='green')
plt.xlabel('Country')
plt.ylabel('Injuries')
plt.show()
source.da753f91:
x1=dataset['Country']
y1=dataset['Injuries/Casualties']
plt.scatter(x1,y1,label='Country && Total Injury cases')

plt.ylabel('Total injury cases')
plt.legend()
plt.show()

plt.show()

source.76c1df54:
groupby_injuries=dataset[['Type','Country','Injuries/Casualties']]
injuries_rate=groupby_injuries.groupby(['Type','Country']).agg(np.max)
injuries_rate.head()
#injuries rate based on types and countries using groupby method

source.6e0b427e:
count_inju1=dataset.groupby('Type').count()
count_inju1['perc_total']=round(count_inju1['Injuries/Casualties']*100/count_inju1['Injuries/Casualties'].sum(),1)
count_inju1 
#total percentage of injuries based on types
